# mallocng-explain

```text
usage: mallocng-explain [-h]

```

Gives a quick explanation of musl's mallocng allocator.

**Alias:** ng-explain
### Optional arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
